title: Travellama
description: An iOS travel-planning app powered by Google Places API and a custom route-optimization engine. Users select a destination, choose restaurants and attractions, set trip length, and instantly receive an auto-generated, fully optimized itinerary. The algorithm minimizes travel time, schedules meals at preferred locations, and balances daily activities using real-time distance and duration calculations. A dynamic calendar UI lets users drag-adjust timeslots, triggering rapid re-optimization for a fully personalized trip plan.
technologies: Flutter, Optimization, Machine Learning, App Development, Python

title: WISearch
description: A machine-learning platform that predicts which socio-educational factors most effectively increase womenâ€™s representation in STEM. Trained on global PISA, gender-gap, inequality, and education datasets. Winner of Technica Hackathon 2019.

title: Jellyfish
description: An augmented reality game that teaches kids chemistry by letting them combine atoms to form molecules in 3D space. Players discover new elements, unlock achievements, and visualize chemical structures right in front of them.

title: Pear.
description: A cross-platform (iOS + Android) personal safety app that leverages machine learning to identify and navigate users to the safest nearby locations in real time. pear. integrates trauma-informed grounding tools, one-tap emergency messaging, hospital mapping, and a secure helpline directory. Features like Incognito Mode and a fake-caller system enable discreet protection and rapid response during high-risk situations.
